code: import moment from"moment";var Dates={DateFormatter:function DateFormatter(dateStr){return moment(dateStr).format("DD/MM/YYYY");},DateTimeFormatter:function DateTimeFormatter(date){return new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-US',{year:"numeric",month:"2-digit",day:"2-digit",hour:"2-digit",minute:"2-digit",second:"2-digit"}).format(date);},PaymentFormatter:function PaymentFormatter(date){return new Intl.DateTimeFormat("fr-CA",{year:"numeric",month:"2-digit",day:"2-digit"}).format(date);}};export default Dates;
